updates.title: Server Maintenance Completed
updates.content:
**Server Maintenance Completed**

We've successfully completed our scheduled server maintenance. All systems are now back online with improved performance. Thank you for your patience!

Please let us know if you encounter any issues.
updates.author: Server Admin

updates.title: New Jobs System Released
updates.content:
**New Jobs System Released**

We're excited to announce our completely revamped jobs system! This update includes:

- 10 new job types with unique progression paths
- Enhanced rewards and benefits
- New job-specific vehicles and tools
- Improved job interactions

Check out the updated job listings at the employment center!
updates.author: Development Team

updates.title: Weekend Racing Tournament
updates.content:
**Weekend Racing Tournament**

Join us this weekend for our monthly racing tournament! Race against other players for a chance to win exclusive prizes and in-game currency.

**Event Details:**
- Starting: Friday 8PM EDT
- Location: Downtown Racing Circuit
- Prizes: $50,000 in-game cash and exclusive vehicle skins

Registration is open now at the Racing Club.
updates.author: Events Team
